abstract: International court in Kosovo, authorized by European Union, sentences Kosovar Serb politician Oliver Ivanovic to nine year prison term for war crimes he committed against ethnic Albanians in 1999.

headline.print_headline: Europe; Kosovo: Politician Sentenced to Prison for War Crimes
headline.main: Kosovo: Politician Sentenced to Prison for War Crimes

keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
keywords.name: subject

snippet: A leading Kosovo Serb politician received a nine-year term after being found guilty of war crimes against ethnic Albanian citizens during Kosovo’s fight for independence from Serbia.
lead_paragraph: A leading Kosovo Serb politician received a nine-year term after being found guilty of war crimes against ethnic Albanian citizens during Kosovo’s fight for independence from Serbia.
